trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when an operation on a workflow instance is not valid because the instance has been aborted.
trans-unit.target: 表示工作流程執行個體上的作業無效，因為執行個體已中止時擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationAbortedException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationAbortedException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationAbortedException"></xref> class with a text string description of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationAbortedException"></xref>類別例外狀況的文字字串描述。

trans-unit.source: A description of the abort exception.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationAbortedException"></xref> class with the context and serialization information required to retrieve data about this exception from a serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationAbortedException"></xref>從序列化資料流擷取這個例外狀況的相關資料所需的內容和序列化資訊的類別。

trans-unit.source: All the information required to serialize or deserialize the abort exception object.
trans-unit.target: 所有所需的資訊來序列化或還原序列化中止例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: The source and destination of a given serialized stream and an additional caller-defined context.
trans-unit.target: 來源和目的端的給定序列化資料流和其他呼叫端定義的內容。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationAbortedException"></xref> class with a text string description of the exception and an additional exception that is the cause of the abort exception.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationAbortedException"></xref>例外狀況，並造成此中止例外狀況的其他例外狀況類別的文字字串描述。

trans-unit.source: A description of the abort exception.
An exception that has a causal relationship to the application aborted exception.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況有因果關係的應用程式中止例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The application aborted exception is thrown in response to the inner exception and can use information from the inner exception to handle the error more appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式中止例外狀況以回應內部例外狀況擲回，且可以使用內部例外狀況的資訊以更適當地處理錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationAbortedException"></xref> class with a text string description of the abort exception and with a unique identifier for it.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationAbortedException"></xref>類別與此中止例外狀況的文字字串描述和其唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: A description of the abort exception.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationAbortedException"></xref> class with a text string description of the abort exception, a unique identifier for it, and an additional exception that is the cause of the abort exception.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationAbortedException"></xref>中止例外狀況、 其唯一識別碼，以及造成此中止例外狀況的其他例外狀況類別的文字字串描述。

trans-unit.source: A description of the abort exception.
An exception that has a causal relationship to the application aborted exception.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況有因果關係的應用程式中止例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The application aborted exception is thrown in response to the inner exception and can use information from the inner exception to handle the error more appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式中止例外狀況以回應內部例外狀況擲回，且可以使用內部例外狀況的資訊以更適當地處理錯誤。
